<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Clinging Shadows Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=6010) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 123 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Qi Spells

</column>

---

You learn a mystical stance that transforms your qi into sticky smoke that shrouds your limbs. You gain the [_clinging shadows stance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2061) qi. While entering the stance is a qi spell, the shadow grasp attacks it grants are not, so you can use them as often as you like while in the stance.

<title level="2">Clinging Shadows Initiate leads to...</title>
[Shadow's Web](/Feats.aspx?ID=6035)
name: Clinging Shadows Initiate
